name: 1dFlagMotion
description: Produces a list of time points with excessive motion relative to the previous time point.
author: AFNI Developers

inputs.name: Motion Parameters File
inputs.description: Input file with EXACTLY 6 columns: roll pitch yaw delta-SI delta-LR delta-AP (angles in degrees followed by translations in mm)

inputs.name: Maximum Translation
inputs.description: Maximum translation allowed in any direction (defaults to 1.5mm)

inputs.name: Maximum Rotation
inputs.description: Maximum rotation allowed in any direction (defaults to 1.25 degrees)

output-files.name: Output Points with Excessive Motion
output-files.description: List of points exceeding the motion bounds in 1D format
